name: Sachiko
description: She appears to be serious, stubborn and old-fashioned, but inside she's just like any other girls her age. She is also a huge fan of Anna, the popular idol.

passiveSkill.name: Flame Gun
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Sachiko appears, she grants a {placeholder} HP Shield. Every 1 Tobunkai partner on the battlefield increases DMG Rate by an additional {placeholder} and DMG RES Rate by an additional {placeholder}."}

uniqueSkill.name: Splitting Wave
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Pierces the enemy with the power of the Sanada Ten Braves. Sachiko attacks an enemy row and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. For each target hit, increases DMG RES Rate by {placeholder} ."}

specialSkill.name: Multishot
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "The spear thrust does not waver. Sachiko a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing her DMG RES Rate by {placeholder}.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Fire Slash
normalSkill.description: Sachiko attacks with her spear from above. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Pierces the enemy with the power of the Sanada Ten Braves. Sachiko attacks an enemy row and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. For each target hit, increases DMG RES Rate by {placeholder} .

templateData.lens6.skill: The spear thrust does not waver. Sachiko a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing her DMG RES Rate by {placeholder}.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
